description: Written and signed land sale agreement
facts: Carol and Dave signed a written contract for the sale of Carol's property
The contract specifies the property address and sale price of $250,000
The contract includes all essential terms
asp_facts: contract(c2). subject_matter(c2, land). parties(c2, carol, dave). has_writing(c2, yes). is_signed(c2, yes). sale_amount(c2, 250000). has_consideration(c2, yes). has_mutual_assent(c2, yes). essential_terms_present(c2, yes).
question: Is this contract enforceable under the Statute of Frauds?
rationale: The contract satisfies the Statute of Frauds because it is in writing, signed by both parties, and contains all essential terms for a land sale.
